headline: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (HWM) Combines Dividend Growth With Aerospace Sector Momentum
summary: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE:HWM) is one of the defense & aerospace stocks gaining from rising geopolitical spending. On January 20, the board of Howmet Aerospace Inc. headline: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (HWM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Howmet Aerospace Inc. on R. Dennis’s Substack by OppCost. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on HWM. Howmet Aerospace Inc.’s share was trading at $215.53 as of January 27th. HWM’s trailing and forward P/E were 60.50 and 48.78 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
